Title: What is new in this release?

Data:
=3.5.2 RELEASE
This is a hotfix addressing article deletion issue in 3.5\\
Minor fixes in integration with TEAM Professor 

=3.5.1 RELEASE
This is a hotfix addressing some minor issues in 3.5


= 3.5 RELEASE
APPLICATION CHANGES:
The following application changes are included in 3.5 release

MAJOR IMPROVEMENTS

- Markdown support\\
- Site Data, which is client customization, and User Data, which is config and Users information, are now separated\\
- Virtual Articles is now supported for redirecting to another TM instance.\\
- Checkmarx native integration for Checkmarx GUI\\
- Direct Link article support, allows  {{{/a/<anyname>}}} to be directly mapped to an article\\



MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS

Note that TEAM Mentor now requires .NET Framework 4.5
